description: This file is a shell script responsible for managing the lifecycle of the 'mldproxy' service, including starting, stopping, and responding to system events such as wan-status and lan-status changes. It includes functions for initializing the service, starting/stopping the proxy, and handling system events, with logic to configure mldproxy based on network status.

methods.name: do_start_mldproxy
methods.description: Starts the mldproxy service by generating a configuration and executing the binary if available.

methods.name: service_init
methods.description: Initializes the service by retrieving configuration settings such as whether mldproxy is enabled and the current WAN interface name.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Starts the mldproxy service if enabled and network conditions are met.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Stops the mldproxy service and cleans up configuration files.
